languages.text: "Здесь, в командном центре, есть {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатор{/g}, к которому подключена {g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}инфокрипта{/g} из святилища логиса Авеля. Туда стекались все отчеты {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}лексмехаников{/g}. К сожалению, мне неведома молитва доступа к ней. Если вы сможете уговорить строптивую машину — возможно, найдете что-то о перемещении Кунрада. Он ведь явно бежал от вас не на крыльях, а на корабле!"

traits.locale_text: "Здесь, в командном центре, есть {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатор{/g}, к которому подключена {g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}инфо-крипта{/g} из святилища логиса Авеля. Туда стекались все отчеты {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}лексмехаников{/g}. К сожалению, мне неведома молитва доступа к ней. Если вы сможете уговорить строптивую машину — возможно, найдете что-то о перемещении Кунрада. Он ведь явно бежал от вас не на крыльях, а на корабле!"

languages.text: "We have a {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} here at the command centre, it's connected to a {g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}data-crypt{/g} from Logis Abel's sanctum. It aggregated all the {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanic{/g} reports. Unfortunately, the access prayer for it is unknown to me. If you manage to convince the stubborn machine, you might learn something about Kunrad's movements. I'd hazard he fled from you on a ship, not on a pair of wings!"
languages.original_text: "Здесь, в командном центре, есть {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатор{/g}, к которому подключена {g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}инфокрипта{/g} из святилища логиса Авеля. Туда стекались все отчеты {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}лексмехаников{/g}. К сожалению, мне неведома молитва доступа к ней. Если вы сможете уговорить строптивую машину — возможно, найдете что-то о перемещении Кунрада. Он ведь явно бежал от вас не на крыльях, а на корабле!"

traits.locale_text: "We have a {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} here at the command centre to which a {g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}data-crypt{/g} from Logis Abel's sanctum is connected. It aggregated all {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}lexmechanic{/g} reports. Unfortunately, the access prayer for it is unknown to me. If you manage to wrangle the stubborn machine, you might find something on Kunrad's movements. I'd presume he fled from you on a ship, not a pair of wings!"

If you manage to convince the stubborn machine, you might learn something about Kunrad's movements. I'd hazard he fled from you on a ship, not on a pair of wings!"

It aggregated all the {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanic{/g} reports. Unfortunately, the access prayer for it is unknown to me. If you manage to convince the stubborn machine, you might learn something about Kunrad's movements. I'd hazard he fled from you on a ship, not on a pair of wings!"

"We have a {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} here at the command centre, it's connected to a {g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}data-crypt{/g} from Logis Abel's sanctum. It aggregated all the {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanic{/g} reports. Unfortunately, the access prayer for it is unknown to me. If you manage to convince the stubborn machine, you might learn something about Kunrad's movements. I'd hazard he fled from you on a ship, not on a pair of wings!"

languages.text: "Wir haben hier in der Befehlszentrale einen {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitator{/g}, der mit einer {g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}Daten-Krypta{/g} aus Logis Abels Sanctum verbunden ist. Er hat alle Berichte des {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanicus{/g} aggregiert. Leider ist mir das Zugangsgebet dafür nicht bekannt. Wenn Ihr die sture Maschine überzeugt, erfahrt Ihr vielleicht etwas über Kunrads Bewegungen. Ich würde annehmen, dass er auf einem Schiff vor Euch geflüchtet ist, nicht mit Hilfe zweier Flügel!"
languages.original_text: "We have a {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} here at the command centre, it's connected to a {g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}data-crypt{/g} from Logis Abel's sanctum. It aggregated all the {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanic{/g} reports. Unfortunately, the access prayer for it is unknown to me. If you manage to convince the stubborn machine, you might learn something about Kunrad's movements. I'd hazard he fled from you on a ship, not on a pair of wings!"

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben hier in der Befehlszentrale einen {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitator{/g}, der mit einer {g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}Daten-Krypta{/g} aus Logis Abels Sanctum verbunden ist. Er hat alle Berichte des {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanicus{/g} aggregiert. Leider ist mir das Zugangsgebet dafür nicht bekannt. Wenn Ihr die sture Maschine überzeugt, erfahrt Ihr vielleicht etwas über Kunrads Bewegungen. Ich würde annehmen, dass er auf einem Schiff vor Euch geflüchtet ist, nicht mit Hilfe zweier Flügel!"

languages.text: « Nous possédons un {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateur{/g} ici même, au centre de commandement, il est relié à une {g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}crypte de données{/g} du sanctum du logis Abel. Il a agrégé tous les rapports du {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}lexmécanicien{/g}. Malheureusement, j'en ignore la prière d'accès. Si vous parvenez à convaincre cette machine têtue, elle vous apprendra peut-être des choses sur les déplacements de Kunrad. Je parie qu'il s'est enfui à bord d'un vaisseau plutôt qu'avec une paire d'ailes ! »
languages.original_text: "We have a {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} here at the command centre, it's connected to a {g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}data-crypt{/g} from Logis Abel's sanctum. It aggregated all the {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanic{/g} reports. Unfortunately, the access prayer for it is unknown to me. If you manage to convince the stubborn machine, you might learn something about Kunrad's movements. I'd hazard he fled from you on a ship, not on a pair of wings!"

traits.locale_text: Nous possédons un {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateur{/g} ici même, au centre de commandement, il est relié à une {g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}crypte de données{/g} du sanctum du logis Abel. Il a agrégé tous les rapports du {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}lexmécanicien{/g}. Malheureusement, j'en ignore la prière d'accès. Si vous parvenez à convaincre cette machine têtue, elle vous apprendra peut-être des choses sur les déplacements de Kunrad. Je parie qu'il s'est enfui à bord d'un vaisseau plutôt qu'avec une paire d'ailes ! »

languages.text: “我们指挥中心这边有个{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}沉思者{/g}，连接着逻辑士亚伯的{g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}数据密存器{/g}，里面汇总了所有{g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}思律机僧{/g}的报告。遗憾的是，我并不知道该如何祷告才能打开它。如果您能说服那台顽固的机器，或许就能得知昆拉德的动向。我敢打赌，他肯定是逃到了某艘船上，毕竟他可没长翅膀！”
languages.original_text: "We have a {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} here at the command centre, it's connected to a {g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}data-crypt{/g} from Logis Abel's sanctum. It aggregated all the {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanic{/g} reports. Unfortunately, the access prayer for it is unknown to me. If you manage to convince the stubborn machine, you might learn something about Kunrad's movements. I'd hazard he fled from you on a ship, not on a pair of wings!"

traits.locale_text: “我们指挥中心这边有个{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}思考器{/g}，连接着逻辑士亚伯的{g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}网络密存器{/g}，里面汇总了所有{g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}法律技工{/g}的报告。遗憾的是，我并不知道该如何祷告才能打开它。如果您能说服那台顽固的机器，或许就能得知昆拉德的动向。我敢打赌，他肯定是逃到了某艘船上，毕竟他可没长翅膀！”

languages.text: 「司令部には{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}があって、論理学者アベルのサンクトゥムの{g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}データクリプト{/g}に接続されている。そこに{g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}法技術者{/g}の報告がすべて集まっているぞ。残念だが、私にはアクセス用の祈りは分からない。あの頑固な機械を説得すれば、クンラッドの動きが分かるかもしれないぞ。ほら、彼は宇宙船に乗ったのだ。2枚の翼をはためかせて逃げたわけではあるまい！」
languages.original_text: "We have a {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} here at the command centre, it's connected to a {g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}data-crypt{/g} from Logis Abel's sanctum. It aggregated all the {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanic{/g} reports. Unfortunately, the access prayer for it is unknown to me. If you manage to convince the stubborn machine, you might learn something about Kunrad's movements. I'd hazard he fled from you on a ship, not on a pair of wings!"

traits.locale_text: 「司令部には{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}があって、論理学者アベルのサンクトゥムの{g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}サイバークリプト{/g}に接続されている。そこに{g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}法技術者{/g}の報告がすべて集まっているぞ。残念だが、私にはアクセス用の祈りは分からない。あの頑固な機械を説得すれば、クンラッドの動きが分かるかもしれないぞ。ほら、彼は宇宙船に乗ったのだ。2枚の翼をはためかせて逃げたわけではあるまい！」

languages.text: «Tenemos un {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitador{/g} aquí en el centro de mando, está conectado a una {g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}cripta de datos{/g} del sanctum del Logos Abel. Agregó todos los informes de {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}lexmecánicos{/g}. Por desgracia, desconozco la oración de acceso. Si consigue convencer a la obstinada máquina, puede que aprenda algo sobre los movimientos de Kunrad. Me atrevería a decir que huyó en una nave, no en un par de alas».
languages.original_text: "We have a {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} here at the command centre, it's connected to a {g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}data-crypt{/g} from Logis Abel's sanctum. It aggregated all the {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanic{/g} reports. Unfortunately, the access prayer for it is unknown to me. If you manage to convince the stubborn machine, you might learn something about Kunrad's movements. I'd hazard he fled from you on a ship, not on a pair of wings!"

traits.locale_text: «Tenemos un {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitador{/g} aquí en el centro de mando, está conectado a un {g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}cibercifrado{/g} del sanctum del Logos Abel. Agregó todos los informes de {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}lexmecánicos{/g}. Por desgracia, desconozco la oración de acceso. Si consigue convencer a la obstinada máquina, puede que aprenda algo sobre los movimientos de Kunrad. Me atrevería a decir que huyó en una nave, no en un par de alas».

languages.text: "Burada, komuta merkezimizde bir {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}kavramsayarımız{/g} var, Logis Abel'in kutağından bir {g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}veri mahzenine{/g} bağlı. Tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmekanik{/g} raporları orada toplanmış durumda. Ne yazık ki cihazın erişim duasını bilmiyorum. İnatçı makineyi ikna edebilirseniz Kunrad'ın hareketleri hakkında bilgi edinebilmeniz mümkün. Herhâlde sizden bir gemiyle kaçmıştır, kanatlanıp uçacak hâli yok ya!"
languages.original_text: "We have a {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} here at the command centre, it's connected to a {g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}data-crypt{/g} from Logis Abel's sanctum. It aggregated all the {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanic{/g} reports. Unfortunately, the access prayer for it is unknown to me. If you manage to convince the stubborn machine, you might learn something about Kunrad's movements. I'd hazard he fled from you on a ship, not on a pair of wings!"

traits.locale_text: "Burada, komuta merkezimizde bir {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}kavramsayar{/g}ımız var, Logis Abel'in kutağından bir {g|Encyclopedia:Cybercrypt}veri mahzeni{/g}ne bağlı. Tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmekanik{/g} raporları orada toplanmış durumda. Ne yazık ki cihazın erişim duasını bilmiyorum. İnatçı makineyi ikna edebilirseniz Kunrad'ın hareketleri hakkında bilgi edinebilmeniz mümkün. Herhâlde sizden bir gemiyle kaçmıştır, kanatlanıp uçacak hâli yok ya!"
